title: Meatballs in tomato sauce
ingredients: ['Meatballs', '450g lean minced beef', '45g fresh breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/8 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 egg, beaten', 'Sauce', '125g chopped onion', '5 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 (400g) tins whole plum peeled tomatoes', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 bay leaf', '170g tomato puree', '3/4 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper']
